translation.en: [newscaster] You're watching Channel 38, Austin. Building a better Texas.
translation.it: State vedendo Canale 38, da Austin. Per un Texas migliore.

translation.en: Now, from your 24-hour news service, this is Good Morning Austin.
translation.it: E ora, dal vostro notiziario 24 ore su 24, ecco a voi Buongiorno Austin. BASATO SU UNA STORIA VERA

translation.en: People in the Southwest are looking for relief from a deadly heat wave.
translation.it: BASATO SU UNA STORIA VERA Si cerca sollievo dalla terribile ondata di caldo.

translation.en: A few areas, like Fort Worth, Texas, and parts of Oklahoma, saw rain Monday
translation.it: Solo su poche aree, Fort Worth in Texas e parti dell'Oklahoma, lunedì sono cadute le prime piogge da molti giorni,

translation.en: for the first time in a long time.
translation.it: lunedì sono cadute le prime piogge da molti giorni,

translation.en: But for most, the month-long drought continues.
translation.it: ma su molte altre zone l'ondata di siccità persiste da oltre un mese.

translation.en: -NBC's Cummins reports. -[dog barking]
translation.it: Ce ne parla Cummins, della NBC.

translation.en: [Robin on recording] You've reached the Murray O'Hairs.
translation.it: Risponde la segreteria dei Murray O'Hair.

translation.en: -Leave a message. -[answering machine beeps]
translation.it: Lasciate un messaggio.

translation.en: [Luke] Hey, it's Luke. It's, uh, 10:00. Where are you?
translation.it: Ciao, sono Luke. Sono le 10:00. Dove siete?

translation.en: Everyone's here.
translation.it: Noi siamo tutti qua.

translation.en: Hey, y'all. Gonna be a scorcher today.
translation.it: Ciao a tutti. Oggi farà un caldo terribile.

translation.en: [Robin] Where are we? [Madalyn] I don't know.
translation.it: - Dove siamo? - Non lo so.

translation.en: [Robin] Grandma?
translation.it: Nonna?

translation.en: [Madalyn] It's all right, Red. We're gonna get out of this.
translation.it: Tranquilla, Red. Andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: -Garth? -[Garth] Yes, Mother.
translation.it: - Garth? - Sì, mamma.

translation.en: Did you get a good look at anybody? Recognize anyone?
translation.it: Sei riuscito a vederli? - Hai riconosciuto qualcuno? - No.

translation.en: -[Garth] No, Mother. -[Madalyn sighs]
translation.it: - Hai riconosciuto qualcuno? - No.

translation.en: [Robin] Shh. I think someone's coming.
translation.it: Credo stia arrivando qualcuno.

translation.en: Check their restraints.
translation.it: Controlla i lacci.

translation.en: [Madalyn] You wanna tell us what the hell we're doin' here?
translation.it: Ci volete dire che diavolo ci facciamo qui?

translation.en: [man] Shut up.
translation.it: Sta' zitta.

translation.en: [Madalyn] You're tellin' me to shut up?
translation.it: Vuoi che stia zitta?

translation.en: I don't think you know whose weeds you're pissing in, buddy.
translation.it: Forse non hai capito con chi hai a che fare, bello.

translation.en: -I said shut up. -[Madalyn] I heard you.
translation.it: - Zitta. - Ti ho sentito,

translation.en: I chose to ignore you.
translation.it: ma ho deciso di ignorarti.

translation.en: Who are you working for, huh?
translation.it: Per chi lavorate?

translation.en: Did Jerry Falwell put you up to this, huh? The Baptists, that it?
translation.it: È stato per caso Jerry Falwell a mandarvi qui? I battisti?

translation.en: -[Garth whispers] Mother, please. -I think we're good.
translation.it: - Mamma, ti prego. - Tutto a posto.

translation.en: All right, let's go.
translation.it: Bene, possiamo andare.

translation.en: [Madalyn] Cocksuckers, you're not gonna get away with this!
translation.it: Teste di cazzo, non la passerete liscia!

translation.en: [shouting] Don't you know who I am?
translation.it: Non sapete chi sono io?

translation.en: [softly] God damn it.
translation.it: Maledizione!

translation.en: -[dogs barking] -[indistinct radio chatter]
translation.it: AUSTIN, TEXAS

translation.en: So, Mr. Collier, you say the cars are gone now.
translation.it: Sig. Collier, non ci sono le auto,

translation.en: Shouldn't they just be in them?
translation.it: ma forse le stanno usando, no?

translation.en: [Roy] The door was open, breakfast on the table,
translation.it: La porta era aperta, la colazione era sul tavolo

translation.en: -and they'd never leave without the dogs. -[man] Mmm-hmm.
translation.it: e non escono mai senza i cani.

translation.en: And you say that this lady lives here with her son and his daughter?
translation.it: La signora quindi vive qui con il figlio e la figlia di lui?

translation.en: Yes. Uh, no. The granddaughter's from her other son.
translation.it: Sì. No. La nipote è figlia dell'altro figlio.

translation.en: It's an interesting living arrangement.
translation.it: Strano ménage.

translation.en: Wait a minute.
translation.it: Aspetti un attimo.

translation.en: Madalyn Murray O'Hair. That's who we're talking about here?
translation.it: Madalyn Murray O'Hair. Stiamo parlando di lei?

translation.en: Are you sure that this isn't just another one of her publicity stunts?
translation.it: Sicuro che non si tratti di un'altra delle sue trovate pubblicitarie?

translation.en: Aren't you even gonna take any fingerprints, sir?
translation.it: Non ha intenzione neanche di prendere le impronte, signore?

translation.en: [smacks lips] Mr. Collier, this is Texas.
translation.it: Sig. Collier, siamo in Texas.

translation.en: Not against the law to go missing here.
translation.it: Sparire non è proibito dalla legge.

translation.en: [Madalyn] Garth, I loosened it. I loosened it.
translation.it: Garth, l'ho allentato.

translation.en: Come here. Give me your hands. Give me your hands.
translation.it: Avvicinati. Usa le mani.

translation.en: -[Garth] What are you-- -Give me your hands.
translation.it: - Cosa... - Usa le mani.

translation.en: Just get it untied. That's...
translation.it: Per sciogliere i lacci.

translation.en: [Garth] I... I can't. [Madalyn] You can do it.
translation.it: - Non ci riesco. - Puoi farcela.

translation.en: -[Garth] Oh, my God. It's really... -That's it. That's it.
translation.it: - Santo cielo, è davvero... - Così.

translation.en: [Garth] What kind of knot is that?
translation.it: Ma che razza di nodo è?

translation.en: [Madalyn] Come on. You can do it.
translation.it: Dai che ce la fai.

translation.en: [Garth] Well, get closer to me, then.
translation.it: Allora, avvicinati ancora un po'.

translation.en: -[Madalyn] Oh, all right. -[Garth grunts]
translation.it: Va bene.

translation.en: [Garth] Jesus! [Madalyn] Come on.
translation.it: - Oh, Signore! - Forza.

translation.en: [Garth] Oh. Almost. I almost got--
translation.it: Ci sono quasi...

translation.en: [Madalyn] Come on. [Garth pants] No, I... No, it's not...
translation.it: - Forza. - No. Non è...

translation.en: -It's useless. It's not gonna happen. -Jesus, Mary and Joseph!
translation.it: - È inutile. - Gesù, Giuseppe e Maria!

translation.en: I knew I should have sent you to fucking Boy Scouts.
translation.it: Avrei dovuto mandarti da quei cazzo di boy scout.

translation.en: [Garth] I don't know what you think you're gonna do anyway. They both have guns.
translation.it: Poi cosa avresti intenzione di fare? Hanno le pistole.

translation.en: [Madalyn sighs] If we could get these hoods off,
translation.it: Senza questi cappucci,

translation.en: we might have a better idea of what we're dealing with.
translation.it: almeno sapremmo con chi abbiamo a che fare.

translation.en: -Come on. Try again. -[Garth] No.
translation.it: - Dai, riprovaci. - No.

translation.en: -[Madalyn] Come on, Garthy-- -No, stop it.
translation.it: - Andiamo, Garthy... - No, basta.

translation.en: [Madalyn] Don't you disobey your mother!
translation.it: Non disobbedire a tua madre!

translation.en: [Garth] Or what, you're gonna take me over your knee?
translation.it: Altrimenti che fai? Mi sculacci?

translation.en: [Madalyn] Yes, I just might-- [Robin] Stop it, both of you!
translation.it: - Sì, potrei... - Smettetela, voi due.

translation.en: [Madalyn softly] God damn it, I have to pee.
translation.it: Maledizione, mi scappa la pipì.

translation.en: Hey, people!
translation.it: Ehi, voi!

translation.en: If you don't let me out of here, I'm gonna piss all over your floor!
translation.it: Se non mi fate uscire, allago tutto il pavimento!

translation.en: [sighs] Lady, you're gonna need to calm down.
translation.it: Signora, deve darsi una calmata.

translation.en: [Madalyn] Calm down? You want me to calm down, shit for brains?
translation.it: Calmarmi io? Ma cos'hai? Merda al posto del cervello?

translation.en: In case you hadn't noticed, we've got bags over our heads,
translation.it: Se non ti fosse chiaro, siamo incappucciati,

translation.en: we're all tied up and I gotta pee!
translation.it: legati e io devo pisciare.

translation.en: You do what we say and everyone gets out of here safe and sound.
translation.it: Fate quello che vi diciamo e uscirete da qui sani e salvi.

translation.en: [Madalyn] Oh, now that sounds like the big man in charge.
translation.it: Questa sembra la voce del capo.

translation.en: Is that the big man in charge?
translation.it: Sei il grande capo?

translation.en: Get this goddamn thing off of my head and show me who you are.
translation.it: Toglimi questa roba dalla testa e vediamo chi sei.

translation.en: You think you got the balls to take me on?
translation.it: Pensi di avere le palle per metterti contro di me?

translation.en: [softly] Jesus Christ.
translation.it: Oh, Gesù.

translation.en: [Madalyn] What? What's going on?
translation.it: Che c'è? Che succede?

translation.en: -Garth, what's going on? -[Garth sighs]
translation.it: Garth, che succede?

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -Robin.
translation.it: - Oh, mio Dio! - Robin.

translation.en: [Madalyn] Oh, my God, is that who I think it is?
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio, si tratta di chi penso io?

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.it: Cazzo.

translation.en: Hello, Madalyn.
translation.it: Ciao, Madalyn.

translation.en: -[Bill] This is Bill Murray. -Bill, it's Roy. Roy Collier.
translation.it: - Bill Murray. - Bill, sono Roy. Roy Collier.

translation.en: What do you want?
translation.it: Che cosa vuoi?

translation.en: It's your mom... and Robin and Garth.
translation.it: Tua madre e Robin e Garth.

translation.en: They've disappeared.
translation.it: Sono scomparsi.

translation.en: I just saw them in Dallas.
translation.it: Li ho appena visti a Dallas.

translation.en: I'm not kidding.
translation.it: Non è uno scherzo.

translation.en: The police said that in order for somebody to officially be considered missing,
translation.it: Per poterli considerare scomparsi, alla polizia di Austin

translation.en: they need somebody in the family to file a report.
translation.it: serve che un familiare sporga denuncia.

translation.en: Why would I do that?
translation.it: Perché dovrei farlo?

translation.en: Besides, they're probably off on some crazy trip again.
translation.it: Staranno facendo uno dei loro assurdi viaggi.

translation.en: -No, this is different, Bill. -Roy...
translation.it: - Stavolta non è così, Bill. - Roy...

translation.en: you know they're not in my life anymore.
translation.it: ...sai che non fanno più parte della mia vita.

translation.en: And, frankly, I'd like to keep it that way.
translation.it: E, onestamente, vorrei lasciare le cose come stanno.

translation.en: Okay?
translation.it: D'accordo?

translation.en: Bill--
translation.it: Bill...

translation.en: Ferguson...
translation.it: Ferguson.

translation.en: I need those 600 words on the Alamo anniversary by 5:00.
translation.it: Voglio 600 parole sull'anniversario di Alamo per le 17:00.

translation.en: Relax, man. It's the same story I wrote last year and the year before that.
translation.it: Tranquillo. È la stessa storia che ho scritto l'anno scorso e due anni fa.

translation.en: Well, can't help it if nothing ever happens in San Antonio.
translation.it: Che posso farci se non succede nulla a San Antonio?

translation.en: No, plenty happens in San Antonio. I just don't get to write about it.
translation.it: Invece succedono tante cose, ma non riesco a scriverci un pezzo.

translation.en: -Where you going? -[phone ringing]
translation.it: Dove vai?

translation.en: [sighs] Shit.
translation.it: Accidenti.

translation.en: -Jack Ferguson. -[Roy] This is the reporter?
translation.it: - Jack Ferguson. - Parlo con il giornalista?

translation.en: On a good day.
translation.it: Quando mi va bene.

translation.en: You know Madalyn Murray O'Hair? She's disappeared.
translation.it: Conosce Madalyn Murray O'Hair? È scomparsa.

translation.en: The damn cops won't do anything.
translation.it: La polizia non se ne sta occupando

translation.en: Only thing I could think to do was call a reporter.
translation.it: e ho pensato di chiamare un giornalista.

translation.en: -Who's this? -Name's Roy. But I gotta go.
translation.it: - Con chi parlo? - Mi chiamo Roy. Ora devo andare.

translation.en: If you wanna know more, come by 1682 Greystone Drive tonight.
translation.it: Se vuole saperne di più, vediamoci stasera al 1682 di Greystone Drive.

translation.en: -What-- -I'll be there.
translation.it: - Che cosa... - Io sarò là.

translation.en: -[dial tone] -Hello?
translation.it: Pronto?

translation.en: [Pup] Madalyn?
translation.it: Madalyn?

translation.en: Bless this food to our use...
translation.it: Benedici il cibo che mangiamo...

translation.en: and us to thy service.
translation.it: ...e noi che Ti serviamo.

translation.en: -Amen. -[Mrs. Murray] Amen.
translation.it: - Amen. - Amen.

translation.en: Now, I don't suppose you found a job today?
translation.it: Non credo tu abbia trovato lavoro oggi, vero?

translation.en: [Madalyn] I had an interview.
translation.it: Ho avuto un colloquio,

translation.en: But I didn't get a law degree to be a damn receptionist.
translation.it: ma non ho preso la laurea in legge per fare la segretaria.

translation.en: [chuckles] You'd be lucky to be someone's receptionist.
translation.it: Saresti fortunata a fare da segretaria a qualcuno.

translation.en: If I were you, I'd start praying.
translation.it: Fossi in te, comincerei a pregare.

translation.en: How do you put up with him, Mother?
translation.it: Come fai a sopportarlo, mamma?

translation.en: The question is, how do I tolerate you?
translation.it: La domanda giusta è: come faccio a sopportare te?

translation.en: Living here for free.
translation.it: Vivi qui senza pagare niente.

translation.en: -Bringing a bastard into my house. -Pup!
translation.it: - Mi porti un bastardo in casa. - Papà!

translation.en: Don't you ever call my son that.
translation.it: Non osare chiamare mio figlio in quel modo.

translation.en: Sweetie, why don't you just take your dinner and go on to our room? Hmm?
translation.it: Tesoro, prendi e porta la cena in camera nostra.

translation.en: [Pup] I am sorry, Billy Boy.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, Billy Boy.

translation.en: I was just trying to make a point about your momma, huh?
translation.it: Stavo solo cercando di far capire una cosa a tua madre.

translation.en: I've got a point I'd like to make.
translation.it: Sono io che devo dire una cosa.

translation.en: What else is new?
translation.it: Che altro c'è di nuovo?

translation.en: No, this is important.
translation.it: No, è una cosa importante.

translation.en: Got an announcement.
translation.it: Ho un annuncio da fare.

translation.en: Getting another grandchild.
translation.it: Avrai un altro nipote.

translation.en: That's right. Your precious daughter's got herself knocked up again.
translation.it: La tua figlia adorata è stata messa incinta un'altra volta.

translation.en: -Oh, honey, no. -Yeah.
translation.it: - Tesoro, no... - Sì.

translation.en: And the guy's kicked me to the curb again, saying it's not his,
translation.it: Quell'uomo mi ha abbandonato dicendo che lui non è il padre,

translation.en: when I know for a fact it absolutely is his.
translation.it: ma io so per certo che è suo.

translation.en: You're an embarrassment.
translation.it: Sei una vergogna.

translation.en: That's right. That's right.
translation.it: Perfetto.

translation.en: Walk away.
translation.it: Scappa pure.

translation.en: Just like they did.
translation.it: Come hanno fatto anche loro.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Mother.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, mamma.

translation.en: -You wanna tell me what happened? -I don't know. Condom broke?
translation.it: - Raccontami cos'è successo. - Non lo so. Si è rotto il preservativo?

translation.en: You sure you wanna keep it?
translation.it: Sicura di volerlo tenere?

translation.en: I mean, I can take care of Pup, and you know how he loves little Bill,
translation.it: Penserò io a papà. Sai quanto vuole bene a Bill.

translation.en: and hopefully he'll come around.
translation.it: Penserò io a papà. Sai quanto vuole bene a Bill. Magari cambierà idea.

translation.en: He's right.
translation.it: Ha ragione.

translation.en: I got a law degree and no job, and a kid and no husband.
translation.it: Ho una laurea in legge, senza un lavoro. E un figlio, senza marito.

translation.en: The only thing I do have is judgment. I get plenty of that.
translation.it: L'unica cosa che non mi manca è il giudizio.

translation.en: Maddy, you made a couple of mistakes, that's all.
translation.it: Dai, Maddy, in fondo hai commesso solo un paio di errori.

translation.en: You know, I see these housewives in their identical homes
translation.it: Penso a quelle casalinghe nelle loro case tutte uguali, che fanno tutte la stessa vita...

translation.en: with their identical lives, and...
translation.it: nelle loro case tutte uguali, che fanno tutte la stessa vita...

translation.en: They disgust me, but sometimes I...
translation.it: Mi viene il voltastomaco, ma a volte...

translation.en: I wish I could be like that, wish I could live like that.
translation.it: ...vorrei poter essere come loro e poter vivere come loro,

translation.en: But I can't.
translation.it: ma non posso.

translation.en: I don't know what to tell you.
translation.it: Non so che cosa dirti.

translation.en: Mom, just lie to me.
translation.it: Puoi mentirmi

translation.en: -Tell me everything's gonna be all right. -Oh...
translation.it: e dirmi che andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: Well, I could be a secretary.
translation.it: Potrei fare la segretaria.

translation.en: Telephone operator.
translation.it: La centralinista.

translation.en: You could sell Avon like Ms. Wright.
translation.it: Potresti vendere prodotti Avon come la sig.na Wright.

translation.en: We're just too damn smart for these hicks.
translation.it: Siamo troppo intelligenti per quei provinciali.

translation.en: -[chanting] We will fight! -[young Bill] What's going on?
translation.it: - Lotteremo! - Che succede?

translation.en: I'll bet they're going to the White Tower restaurant.
translation.it: Scommetto che stanno andando al ristorante White Tower.

translation.en: Why?
translation.it: Perché?

translation.en: Well, Billy Boy... [sighs]
translation.it: Beh, Billy Boy...

translation.en: not all people are treated the same in this world.
translation.it: ...a questo mondo non siamo tutti uguali.

translation.en: Because they're non...
translation.it: Perché sono non...

translation.en: -Noncon-- -Nonconformist?
translation.it: - Non... - Non conformisti?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Well, you could say that, I guess.
translation.it: - Ecco. - Si può dire così.

translation.en: White Tower won't serve Negroes... so they're protesting.
translation.it: Al White Tower non servono le persone di colore... ...quindi stanno protestando.

translation.en: And if they protest, will that make the White Tower serve them?
translation.it: ...quindi stanno protestando. Se protestano, potranno farsi servire al White Tower?

translation.en: No, the owners of that place are damn racists.
translation.it: No, i proprietari sono dei razzisti bastardi.

translation.en: Makes me so mad.
translation.it: Questo mi fa imbestialire.

translation.en: I bet they call themselves Christians, too.
translation.it: E penseranno di essere dei bravi cristiani.

translation.en: Grandpa says you might find a job if you were more Christian.
translation.it: Il nonno dice che lavorerai se diventerai più cristiana.

translation.en: Ah, your grandpa's full of crap.
translation.it: Il nonno dice che lavorerai se diventerai più cristiana. Dice un sacco di stronzate.

translation.en: Grandpa says you're the one full of crap.
translation.it: Il nonno dice che sei tu a dirle.

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.it: Prego?

translation.en: Well, you're always going on about what's wrong with people,
translation.it: Parli sempre di quello che gli altri fanno di sbagliato,

translation.en: but you don't do anything about it.
translation.it: ma tu non fai mai niente.

translation.en: You just complain.
translation.it: Ti lamenti e basta.

translation.en: [newscaster] Close to 100 demonstrators stepped out to protest the whites-only policy
translation.it: Quasi 100 persone stanno protestando contro la politica "solo bianchi"

translation.en: of the White Tower restaurant in downtown Baltimore.
translation.it: del ristorante White Tower, nel centro di Baltimora.

translation.en: The activists were met with some resistance
translation.it: Gli attivisti hanno incontrato una certa resistenza

translation.en: from supporters of segregation.
translation.it: da parte dei fautori della segregazione.

translation.en: [woman] I think that, uh, as much as we regret it, integration is here,
translation.it: Per quanto possa dispiacere, l'integrazione è prossima,

translation.en: and I would like to be able to do as much as I can to prevent it coming.
translation.it: ma io vorrei fare il possibile per evitare che si affermi.

translation.en: [newscaster] But one white woman and her son actually showed up
translation.it: Ma una donna bianca con il figlio ha manifestato

translation.en: to march with the Negroes.
translation.it: a favore dei neri.

translation.en: The owners of the White Tower restaurant should be ashamed of themselves.
translation.it: I proprietari del White Tower dovrebbero vergognarsi.

translation.en: This is Baltimore, not Nazi Germany.
translation.it: Siamo a Baltimora, non nella Germania nazista.

translation.en: [newscaster] And what about you, young man? Why are you here?
translation.it: E tu, giovanotto? Perché sei qui?

translation.en: [young Bill] I'm here because I don't like racists,
translation.it: Perché non mi piacciono i razzisti

translation.en: and because I'm a nonconformist like my mom.
translation.it: e perché sono un non conformista come mia madre.

translation.en: That's my boy.
translation.it: Bravo il mio bambino.

translation.en: What were you thinking?
translation.it: Ma che vi è venuto in mente?

translation.en: I was trying to teach your grandson a lesson.
translation.it: Ho voluto dare un insegnamento a tuo nipote:

translation.en: "Judge not, lest ye be judged."
translation.it: "Non giudicate per non essere giudicati".

translation.en: What about the neighbors?
translation.it: E i vicini?

translation.en: What do you care what nosy old Mrs. Mosley thinks?
translation.it: Che ti importa di cosa pensa quella ficcanaso della sig.ra Mosley?

translation.en: You really are one selfish SOB.
translation.it: Sei proprio un bastardo egoista.

translation.en: Just 'cause you read the goddamn Bible every night,
translation.it: Solo perché leggi quella dannata Bibbia tutte le sere,

translation.en: you think you're so high and mighty and moral,
translation.it: pensi di essere straordinario, onnipotente e moralmente irreprensibile,

translation.en: when there are people out there
translation.it: e non pensi a quelle persone

translation.en: who are actually, really, truly suffering--
translation.it: che soffrono veramente...

translation.en: -You know, I've got some cold cuts-- -Mother, it's all--
translation.it: - C'è della carne... - Mamma, è...

translation.en: You have no right to lecture me about morality.
translation.it: Non hai nessun diritto di farmi la predica sulla moralità.

translation.en: You can take your morals and shove them up your ass.
translation.it: Tieniti pure i tuoi principi morali e ficcateli nel culo.

translation.en: May the Lord have mercy on your soul, Madalyn.
translation.it: Che il Signore abbia pietà della tua anima.

translation.en: Ooh, the Lord. I'm quaking in my boots.
translation.it: Il Signore. Sto tremando come una foglia.

translation.en: Where was the Lord when I got knocked up, huh?
translation.it: Dov'era il Signore quando sono rimasta incinta?

translation.en: Where is the Lord now?
translation.it: Dov'è adesso il Signore?

translation.en: [Madalyn] What, Mother?
translation.it: Che c'è, mamma?

translation.en: I believe we need a spiritual revolution in America.
translation.it: Credo che l'America abbia bisogno di una rivoluzione spirituale.

translation.en: We need a revolt against materialism,

translation.en: a revolt against crime,
translation.it: contro il peccato,

translation.en: a revolt against the emphasis on sex,
translation.it: contro l'esaltazione del sesso,

translation.en: a revolt against the sins...
translation.it: contro i peccati...

translation.en: [Madalyn] It's like I keep telling you, it's just case after case down there.
translation.it: È come dicevo. Un caso dopo l'altro.

translation.en: [Mrs. Murray] Such a shame.

translation.en: who got thrown out of her home, and there is no place to put her. I mean, no place whatsoever.

translation.en: Just a sec, Bill.

translation.en: -[Bill] Mom! -Jesus, Mary and Joseph.
translation.it: - Mamma! - Gesù, Giuseppe e Maria.

translation.en: [Billy Graham] You can find everything that you've been searching for in Christ.

translation.en: I don't want him getting any ideas.

translation.en: I'm gonna get in trouble again.

translation.en: Well, it's not my fault you missed the bus.

translation.it: - Come? Stai scherzando? - Lo recitiamo tutti i giorni.

translation.en: She said we all have to bow our heads and pray.

translation.en: [all] ...and the power and the glory.
translation.it: ...la sua potenza e la sua gloria.

translation.en: -Amen. -What the hell's going on in here?
translation.it: - Amen. - Ma che diavolo state facendo?

translation.en: Excuse me?

translation.en: I would've sent him to goddamn Catholic school.

translation.en: -Mrs. Murray-- -Ms. Murray.
translation.it: - Sig.ra Murray... - Sig.na Murray.

translation.en: Ms. Murray...
translation.it: Sig.na Murray...

translation.en: this is our morning devotion.
translation.it: ...questa è la preghiera del mattino.

translation.en: -You don't want him to-- -Mmm-mmm.
translation.it: Non vuole che...

translation.en: Well, Mrs.... uh, Lutz, is it?
translation.it: Sig.ra Lutz, no?

translation.en: Have you heard about the Constitution, by any chance?

translation.en: because, apparently, she flunked that class.
translation.it: perché sembra che non abbia superato quell'esame.

translation.en: In the Constitution, there is something called the First Amendment.

translation.en: And that protects the freedom of speech and religion.

translation.en: Are there any Jews in the class?

translation.en: Do your parents know that you are being forced to recite
translation.it: I tuoi genitori sanno che devi recitare

translation.it: - questa arcaica idiozia? - Sig.na Murray!

translation.en: -I'm just trying to make a point. -Obviously.
translation.it: - Sto cercando di dire una cosa. - Certo.

translation.en: The school board cannot force my son to pray, or anyone else for that matter.

translation.en: So... sue them.

translation.en: First of all, can I just say, it is wonderful to see you all again.

translation.en: Garth. [chuckles]
translation.it: Garth.

translation.en: I wanna keep this reunion as brief as possible.

gin.

translation.en: Now you're just being modest.

translation.en: That preacher's more full of shit than a Christmas turkey, that's for sure.
translation.it: Quel predicatore ha più merda dentro di un tacchino ripieno a Natale.

translation.en: Oh, hell, he's more full of shit than a goddamn humpback whale!
translation.it: Direi, semmai, più merda di una fottuta balena!

translation.en: So... you're here about the, uh, office management position?
translation.it: Allora, lei è qui per il ruolo di amministratore?

translation.en: -[clicks tongue] Yes, ma'am. -Yeah, you sure you, uh, wanna join us?
translation.it: Sì, signora. Sicuro di voler lavorare con noi?

translation.en: Right now, we're holding this place together
translation.it: Al momento, stiamo tirando avanti

translation.en: with bailing wire and chewing gum.
translation.it: con ben poche risorse.

translation.en: I have held together more with less.
translation.it: Mi sono trovato in situazioni ben peggiori.

translation.en: My son, Bill, he used to, uh, run the place.
translation.it: Mio figlio Bill occupava questa posizione...

translation.en: But, uh... he screwed me over.
translation.it: ...ma mi ha rovinato la vita.

translation.en: Oh, now those goddamn zombie twelve-steppers got a hold of him and...
translation.it: Adesso gli zombi degli Alcolisti Anonimi lo tengono in pugno e...

translation.en: Do you, uh, drink, Mr. Waters?
translation.it: Lei beve, sig. Waters?

translation.en: I do have a few of the usual vices.
translation.it: Ho qualche vizio anch'io.

translation.en: Oh, good.
translation.it: Bene.

translation.en: 'Cause I do not go in for that teetotalin' crap.
translation.it: Perché non mi piacciono quelle stronzate da astemi.

translation.en: There we go.
translation.it: Ecco.

translation.en: Here's to.
translation.it: Brindiamo.

translation.en: It has been mentioned that you, uh... spent some time in the Illinois State Pen.
translation.it: C'è scritto che è stato recluso per un po' nel penitenziario di stato dell'Illinois.

translation.en: [stammers] Just a few petty crimes... when I was younger.
translation.it: Quando ero giovane, per alcuni piccoli reati.

translation.en: Well...
translation.it: Beh...

translation.en: if Hail Marys really could absolve us... we'd all be goddamn murderers.
translation.it: ...se un'Ave Maria ci potesse assolvere dai peccati, saremmo tutti assassini.

translation.en: Now the first thing she wants you to do is help get the books in order.
translation.it: Per prima cosa, vuole che aiuti a tenere in ordine la contabilità.

translation.en: We usually get the statements from Bank of Austin on the third of the month.
translation.it: Gli estratti conto della Banca di Austin arrivano il giorno tre del mese.

translation.en: This is where we keep the ledger.
translation.it: Il libro mastro sta qui.

translation.en: You'll have the only key, besides me.

translation.en: You'll register all processed checks here.
translation.it: Gli assegni controllati vanno qui.

translation.en: Wait, these are all donations?
translation.it: Ma queste sono tutte donazioni?

translation.en: That's right.
translation.it: Esatto.

translation.en: There's a check here for $20,000. Another for 12.
translation.it: C'è un assegno di 20.000 dollari e un altro di 12.000.

translation.en: I know.
translation.it: Lo so.

translation.en: In God we trust. Right?
translation.it: In Dio noi confidiamo. No?

translation.en: Good luck.
translation.it: Buona fortuna.

translation.en: Mmm, what's going on?
translation.it: Che c'è?

translation.en: The money made it out of New Zealand.
translation.it: I soldi hanno lasciato la Nuova Zelanda.

translation.en: It won't be long now.
translation.it: Non ci vorrà ancora molto.

translation.en: [chuckles] It's about time.
translation.it: Era ora.

translation.en: The van's out back.
translation.it: Il furgone è qua dietro.

translation.en: you try anything... anything, Madalyn and Robin are dead.
translation.it: Non fare scherzi, altrimenti considera Madalyn e Robin già morte.

translation.en: No, I got it.
translation.it: No, ho capito.

translation.en: Let's go.

translation.en: Bye, Mother.

translation.en: -You be careful, Garth. -[Garth] Okay.

translation.en: You know those bills are gonna be marked. [scoffs]

translation.en: They're getting a cashier's check.

translation.en: Then we're using that to buy gold coins. Something that can't be traced.

translation.en: -Here you go, Grandma. -Thank you, darlin'.
translation.it: - Tieni, nonna. - Grazie, tesoro.

translation.en: Well, it looks like you might have me here.
translation.it: Sembra tu voglia trattenermi qui.

translation.en: 'Night.
translation.it: Buonanotte.

translation.en: [mutters] Wait a minute.
translation.it: Aspetta un attimo.

translation.en: Gin.
translation.it: E gin!

translation.en: You'll win next time.
translation.it: Vincerai la prossima volta.

translation.en: -[scoffing] Yeah. -[chuckling] Sure, I'll win one of these days.
translation.it: Certo, un giorno vincerò io.

translation.en: You've done a real good job here, David.
translation.it: Hai fatto un ottimo lavoro, David...

translation.en: But, uh...
I want you to know I did some, uh... digging...
translation.it: ...voglio che tu sappia che ho spulciato un po'...

translation.en: into your record.
translation.it: ...la tua fedina penale.

translation.en: True you were picked up for hustling?

translation.en: I told you I am trying to put all that behind me.

translation.en: I don't give a shit what you do with your pecker.

translation.en: But, David...
translation.it: ...ma, David...

translation.en: you killed a man.
translation.it: ...hai ucciso un uomo.

translation.en: Now, tell me about him.
translation.it: Me ne vuoi parlare?

translation.en: Just between us.

translation.en: I didn't have a picture-perfect childhood, Madalyn.
translation.it: Non ho avuto un'infanzia felice, Madalyn.

translation.en: My mother was a prostitute.

translation.en: And she was in and out of prison so much that I'd do
translation.it: Non faceva altro che entrare e uscire di prigione

translation.en: whatever I had to do to survive.
translation.it: e io mi sono arrangiato per sopravvivere.

translation.en: I hooked up with this gang. I started stealing here and there, and...
translation.it: Mi unii a una banda e cominciai con qualche furtarello...

translation.en: this guy we were with got caught after this liquor store job we did.
translation.it: Ci beccarono in flagrante in un negozio di liquori.

translation.en: He turned on me.
translation.it: Quel tipo mi tradì.

translation.en: I may not believe in God, but I do believe in karma.
translation.it: Posso anche non credere in Dio, ma credo senz'altro nel karma.

translation.en: All that crap about past lives?

translation.en: Yeah, well...
translation.it: Beh...

translation.en: maybe not karma.
translation.it: ...forse non si tratta di karma.

translation.en: Retaliation.
translation.it: Ma di ritorsione.

translation.en: I was gonna teach this guy a lesson.

translation.en: But when I started with that tire iron...
translation.it: ...ma poi con quella chiave inglese...

translation.en: I don't know, I just...
translation.it: Non so, io...

translation.en: I lost control.

translation.en: [sighs] I got 30 years, but I only did half.

translation.en: Got out for good behavior.
translation.it: Sono uscito per buona condotta.

translation.en: And I swore I would never lose control again.
translation.it: Giuro che non mi succederà più di perdere il controllo.

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.it: Grazie.

translation.en: Thank you for telling me the fucking truth.
translation.it: Grazie per avermi raccontato la verità.

translation.en: Yeah, you live long enough and you lose faith in people.

translation.en: -Not that I ever had much faith in anyone. -[chuckles]

translation.en: But...
you have impressed me, David.
translation.it: ...tu mi hai colpito, David.

translation.en: Starting to wish Bill Jr. could've turned out more like you.

translation.en: He really hurt you, huh?

translation.en: He betrayed me.
translation.it: Mi ha tradito.

translation.en: That's what men do. Betray me.

translation.en: But, no, David, he didn't hurt me.
translation.it: In fondo, no. Non mi ha ferito.

translation.en: Nobody can really hurt me.

translation.en: Now that I trust you, I wanna show you something.

translation.en: I'm giving you a promotion, David.

translation.en: So far, you've been keeping track of most of our donations

translation.en: in the official ledger book.
translation.it: nell'apposito registro.

translation.en: I say most of them because...

translation.en: this is our unofficial ledger.
translation.it: ...questo è il registro non ufficiale.

translation.en: I'll keep your secrets, you keep mine.
translation.it: Manterrò i tuoi segreti e tu i miei.

translation.en: Where are the rest?

translation.en: In the trunk.
translation.it: Nel furgone.

translation.en: Well, at least $400,000 of it is.

translation.en: Four hundred? Gary, what the hell?
translation.it: 400.000 dollari? Gary, che cavolo è successo?

translation.en: The fucking guy didn't have enough.
translation.it: Quel tipo non ne aveva a sufficienza.

translation.en: We get the rest next week.
translation.it: La prossima settimana avremo le altre.

translation.en: Shit.
translation.it: Cazzo.

translation.en: Shit.
translation.it: Cazzo.

translation.en: Shit! Shit! Shit! Shit! Shit!
translation.it: Cazzo!

translation.en: Is that really necessary?
translation.it: Era proprio necessario?

translation.en: Oh, don't tell me it's another hiccup. [scoffs]

translation.en: [Garth] We have to wait for another shipment of coins.

translation.en: What?
translation.it: Come?

translation.en: They'll be here next Tuesday.
translation.it: Arriveranno il prossimo martedì.

translation.en: Oh, for... This is getting ridiculous.

translation.en: -Shut up. You're not in charge here. -[Madalyn laughing]

translation.en: All right, I got it. I got it. You're the big boss.

translation.en: But God damn it, David, if you aren't fucking up this job
translation.it: Cazzo se stai mandando a puttane anche questo, David,

translation.en: like everything else you've ever done.
translation.it: come tutto quello che fai.

translation.en: Mother!
translation.it: Mamma!

translation.en: If I shot you in the head right now, do you think anyone would care?

translation.en: The state of Texas would probably give me a fucking medal.

translation.en: Look at this.
translation.it: Guarda qua.

translation.en: $625,000 is missing from the New Zealand account.
translation.it: Mancano 625.000 dollari dal conto della Nuova Zelanda.

translation.en: Withdrawn right after they disappeared.

translation.en: I say we take the coins we've got and get out of town.

translation.en: They've got nothing.

translation.en: If anything, this is just further proof that they took the money and ran.
translation.it: Semmai, tutto fa pensare che abbiano preso i soldi e siano fuggiti.

translation.en: Oh, fuck.
translation.it: Cazzo.

translation.en: We've got two more days before the second shipment comes through.
translation.it: Mancano ancora due giorni alla prossima consegna.

translation.en: And we have come too far to let a second-page story get in our way.

translation.en: Well, thank you for finally coming in here, Bill. Appreciate it.

translation.en: When you told me about the dogs, I knew something wasn't right.

translation.en: So, why'd it take you so long to file a report?

translation.en: It's complicated. [chuckles]

translation.en: My mother turned my own daughter against me...

translation.en: What did the cops say?

translation.en: They told me they would get back to me if anything turned up.

translation.en: Wish I could say I was surprised.

translation.en: So I sent a sketch artist down to work with the guy who bought Garth's car.

translation.en: Should have something soon. I would love for you to take a look.

translation.en: Of course.

translation.en: Oh, this money that's gone missing,
translation.it: E per il denaro scomparso,

translation.en: do you have any idea who could've had access to that?

translation.en: -Accountants? Lawyers? -Mmm.
translation.it: Contabili? Avvocati?

translation.en: All her finances were done in-house at American Atheists.

translation.en: You know... if somebody did something to them...

translation.en: it's probably someone from that place.

translation.en: My mother pissed off a lot of people.

translation.en: Especially those she was closest to.

translation.en: -[Christmas music playing] -[clears throat] Uh, excuse me, uh...
translation.it: AUSTIN, TEXAS 1994 Scusate. Voglio dirvi che gli Atei Americani hanno trascorso un anno meraviglioso.

translation.en: I just want to say American Atheists has had a wonderful year, and...

translation.en: that would not be so without all of you.

translation.en: So, thank you, and a very happy winter solstice.

translation.en: -I'll go check on those cookies. -Okay. [chuckles]

translation.en: to leave her their entire estates...

translation.en: And I don't know what she did to Bill,

translation.en: but if I was him, I would have suffered through until she kicked the bucket,

translation.en: [chuckling] I mean, Garth's not gonna take over. Can you imagine?

translation.en: Oh, I am assuming it was the drink talking, otherwise I would fire your ass.

translation.en: What? You wanna get rid of me?

translation.en: -[Madalyn sighs] -Go ahead.
translation.it: Fallo,

translation.en: Secrets that might interest the IRS in particular.

translation.en: Are you threatening me?

translation.en: Go, tell the IRS whatever you want.

translation.en: Scream it from the mountaintops.

translation.en: You think they're gonna believe a fucking felon?

translation.en: You just wanna be the momma I never had, give us both a second chance.

translation.en: [Madalyn] Garth!

translation.en: he used to mix a mean Manhattan.

translation.en: [chuckling] Hey, Bob, it's, uh... it's Danny.

translation.en: Um... You know, I was actually just headed back to Florida just now, but, um...
translation.it: Stavo per tornare in Florida...

translation.en: I've got a couple things I gotta tie up still here in Texas.
translation.it: ...ma ho ancora delle faccende da sbrigare in Texas.

translation.en: So, uh...
translation.it: Quindi...

translation.en: But I'm gonna be sending you a letter.
translation.it: Ti manderò una lettera.

translation.en: And if you could just hang onto it for me, that would be great.
translation.it: Vorrei che tu la conservassi per te. Te ne sarei grato.

translation.en: Okay, thanks. Bye.
translation.it: Bene, grazie. Ciao.

translation.en: Yes, Mother?
translation.it: Sì, mamma?

translation.en: I know you don't like me very much.
translation.it: So che non ti piaccio un granché.

translation.en: That's not true, Mother.
translation.it: Non è vero, mamma.

translation.en: Well, you call me names behind my back.
translation.it: Mi dici parole brutte alle spalle.

translation.en: You mean like "fat cunt"?
translation.it: Ti riferisci a "brutta stronza"?

translation.en: You call me "fat cunt"?
translation.it: Mi hai chiamato "brutta stronza"?

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.it: Sì.

translation.en: Well, you've called me worse.
translation.it: Tu hai usato espressioni ben peggiori per me.

translation.en: I suppose.
translation.it: Suppongo di sì.

translation.en: It doesn't mean anything, you know that.
translation.it: Ma non ha alcun valore.

translation.en: What about you, Red?
translation.it: E tu, Red?

translation.en: You hate me for taking you away from your father?
translation.it: Mi odi per averti allontanato da tuo padre?

translation.en: You didn't take me away from him.
translation.it: Non sei stata tu ad avermi allontanata da lui.

translation.en: I was too hard on him.
translation.it: Sono stata troppo dura con lui.

translation.en: I'm too hard on all of you.
translation.it: Come lo sono stata con tutti voi.

translation.en: You're only hard on us because you believe we can be great.
translation.it: Lo sei solo perché vuoi il meglio per noi.

translation.en: I love you two.
translation.it: Vi voglio bene.

translation.en: Everything I've ever done, I... I've done for you kids.
translation.it: Tutto quello che ho fatto, l'ho fatto per voi.

translation.en: Bill, too.
translation.it: E anche per Bill.

translation.en: What do you say?
translation.it: Che ne dite?

translation.en: When we get out of this,
translation.it: Quando sarà tutto finito,

translation.en: we take a drive down to Dallas and visit your father, hmm?
translation.it: andremo a Dallas a vedere tuo padre.

translation.en: -Are you serious? -I am.
translation.it: - Dici davvero? - Certo.

translation.en: And if the bastard refuses to see us,
translation.it: Se poi quel bastardo non ci volesse incontrare,

translation.en: [chuckling] well, I'll just bang down the goddamn door.
translation.it: butteremo giù a pedate la sua porta.

translation.en: -Now, that I'd like to see. -[laughs]
translation.it: Voglio proprio vederlo.

translation.en: I'm gonna miss you, Red.
translation.it: Mi mancherai, Red.

translation.en: Don't call me that.
translation.it: Non chiamarmi così.

translation.en: No! No!
translation.it: No!

translation.en: [newscaster] She called herself the most hated woman in America.
translation.it: Si è definita la donna più odiata d'America.

translation.en: Tonight, the incredible case of Madalyn Murray O'Hair.
translation.it: Stasera, l'incredibile caso di Madalyn Murray O'Hair. LA DONNA PIÙ ODIATA D'AMERICA

translation.en: [reporter] In 1963, Madalyn Murray O'Hair found the cause that would make her famous.
translation.it: Nel 1963, Madalyn Murray O'Hair è riuscita a diventare famosa,

translation.en: And some say, rich.
translation.it: e, qualcuno dice, anche ricca.

translation.en: She filed a lawsuit against the Baltimore public school board.
translation.it: Ha intentato una causa contro la scuola pubblica di Baltimora.

translation.en: The case would go all the way to the Supreme Court
translation.it: Il caso è giunto fino alla Corte Suprema.

translation.en: in a landmark ruling that banned prayer in schools.
translation.it: La sentenza, storica, ha bandito la preghiera dalle scuole.

translation.en: Over the next three decades,
translation.it: Nei successivi 30 anni,

translation.en: no one person has been thought a bigger threat to religion.
translation.it: nessuno mai come lei ha rappresentato una vera minaccia per la religione.

translation.en: In 1995, Madalyn was 77 years old, in failing health,
translation.it: Nel 1995, Madalyn aveva 77 anni ed era gravemente malata.

translation.en: and likely would've spent her remaining years in relative obscurity.
translation.it: Probabilmente pensava di passare il resto dei suoi anni nell'ombra.

translation.en: Except that, before she could die,
translation.it: Salvo che, prima di morire,

translation.en: the nation's most famous atheist suddenly vanished.
translation.it: l'atea più famosa del Paese è scomparsa.

translation.en: [Jack] Well, the thing that strikes you is there was no panic
translation.it: È sorprendente che la scomparsa dei Murray O'Hair

translation.en: when the Murray O'Hairs disappeared.
translation.it: non ha gettato nessuno nel panico.

translation.en: There was no real effort to find them. Uh...
translation.it: Nessuno si è impegnato a ritrovarli.

translation.en: Yet there was over $600,000 missing, Robin's car was abandoned,
translation.it: Eppure son spariti 600.000 dollari, l'auto di Robin è stata abbandonata

translation.en: and another was sold by a mysterious stranger.
translation.it: e un'altra è stata venduta da un misterioso individuo.

translation.en: [reporter] Mark Sparrow answered the ad in the newspaper
translation.it: Mark Sparrow ha risposto a un annuncio

translation.en: and thought he'd found a steal of a deal
translation.it: e ha pensato a un affare,

translation.en: since the car was priced $5,000 below Blue Book value.
translation.it: visto che l'auto costava 5000 dollari meno del suo valore. NAPLES, FLORIDA 1998

translation.en: But although Garth Murray's signature appears
translation.it: Anche se sull'atto di vendita

translation.en: -on the title of transfer documents... -Danny?
translation.it: - compare la firma di Garth Murray... - Danny?

translation.en: ...Sparrow is certain that the man who sold him the car was not Garth Murray.
translation.it: ...Sparrow sostiene che l'uomo che gli ha venduto l'auto non è Garth Murray.

translation.en: [Bob] Right before Danny disappeared, I got a call.
translation.it: Il giorno prima della sparizione di Danny, mi chiamò.

translation.en: He told me he was sending a letter.
translation.it: Mi disse che stava per spedire una lettera.

translation.en: There weren't many details.
translation.it: Non mi spiegò molto,

translation.en: But he said he and a guy named Gary Karr were in on a kidnapping scheme,
translation.it: ma mi disse che con un certo Gary Karr era stato coinvolto in un rapimento

translation.en: brought in by somebody called David Waters.
translation.it: da qualcuno che rispondeva al nome di David Waters.

translation.en: Danny said these people they took...
translation.it: Danny disse che le persone che avevano rapito

translation.en: were expecting to come out of it alive.
translation.it: si sarebbero aspettate di uscire sane e salve.

translation.en: But he wasn't so sure.
translation.it: Ma lui non ne era così sicuro.

translation.en: And you told all this to the police?
translation.it: E ne ha parlato con la polizia?

translation.en: Sure.
translation.it: Certo.

translation.en: Yeah, but they didn't seem too keen on looking for a missing ex-con.
translation.it: Ma non mi sono sembrati così ansiosi di cercare un ex detenuto.

translation.en: I called Waters up looking for Danny.
translation.it: Ho chiamato Waters chiedendo di Danny.

translation.en: He made up some excuse.
translation.it: Si è inventato delle scuse.

translation.en: And then he threatened to kill my family.
translation.it: E poi ha minacciato di fare fuori la mia famiglia.

translation.en: Are you prepared to go on the record?
translation.it: È pronto a uscire sui giornali?

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.it: Sì.

translation.en: [woman] Mr. Waters, I'm not one for plea agreements,
translation.it: SAN ANTONIO, TEXAS 1998 Non sono per i patteggiamenti, ma non ho voce in capitolo.

translation.en: but I don't really have a say in the matter.
translation.it: Non sono per i patteggiamenti, ma non ho voce in capitolo.

translation.en: You've discussed this with your lawyer?
translation.it: Ne ha parlato con il suo avvocato?

translation.en: Go ahead.
translation.it: Continui.

translation.en: Gary was like a mad dog.
translation.it: Gary sembrava un cane rabbioso.

translation.en: Sooner or later he was gonna bite.
translation.it: Prima o poi avrebbe fatto del male a qualcuno.

translation.en: Oh, Jesus Christ.
translation.it: Santo cielo!

translation.en: God damn it, Karr. What the fuck did you do?
translation.it: Dannazione, Karr. Ma che cazzo hai fatto?

translation.en: [Danny] Jesus! David?
translation.it: Gesù! David?

translation.en: What are we gonna do now? -[softly] Calm down. -[Danny breathing heavily]
translation.it: - E ora cosa facciamo? - Calma.

translation.en: I knew something like this was gonna happen.
translation.it: Sapevo che sarebbe successo.

translation.en: We gotta get her body into the bedroom so they don't see her.
translation.it: Ora portiamo il suo corpo in camera per non fargliela vedere.

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.it: No.

translation.en: [sobbing] No! David, no!
translation.it: No! David! No!

translation.en: Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
translation.it: Oddio.

translation.en: Danny, do something!
translation.it: Danny, fa' qualcosa.

translation.en: Mother!
translation.it: Mamma!

translation.en: -No! -Don't look! Don't look!
translation.it: - No! - Non guardare!

translation.en: [sobbing] Oh, God!
translation.it: Oddio!

translation.en: Do it.
translation.it: Fallo.

translation.en: Here.
translation.it: Qui.

translation.en: Do it.
translation.it: Fallo.

translation.en: Do it.
translation.it: Fallo.

translation.en: Gary, I can't.
translation.it: Gary, non posso.

translation.en: [David] He couldn't be trusted to keep his mouth shut, so...
translation.it: Non potevamo essere sicuri che tenesse la bocca chiusa,

translation.en: I had Gary take him out, too.
translation.it: allora, l'ho fatto ammazzare da Gary.

translation.en: [woman] What happened to the money?
translation.it: E dove sono finiti i soldi?

translation.en: We kept the gold in a storage locker.
translation.it: Avevamo messo i soldi in un magazzino.

translation.en: And when we went to collect... [sighs]
translation.it: Quando siamo andati a riprenderli,

translation.en: ...it was gone.
translation.it: non c'erano più.

translation.en: We'd been robbed.
translation.it: Siamo stati derubati.

translation.en: Fucking five-dollar lock.
translation.it: Una cazzo di serratura da cinque dollari.

translation.en: I never intended to kill her.
translation.it: Non ho mai pensato di ucciderla.

translation.en: But I can't say that I'm sorry that she's dead.
translation.it: Ma non posso dire di essere dispiaciuto che sia morta.

translation.en: [reporter] We're live here at Camp Wood,
translation.it: Siamo in diretta da Camp Wood,

translation.en: where confessed murderer David Waters is leading police
translation.it: dove il reo confesso David Waters ha condotto la polizia

translation.en: to the spot where he buried the bodies of Madalyn Murray O'Hair,
translation.it: sul luogo in cui ha seppellito Madalyn Murray O'Hair,

translation.en: her son and granddaughter, on that gruesome night in 1995.
translation.it: il figlio e la nipote, in quell'orribile notte del 1995.

translation.en: There were rumors that they had fled to New Zealand...
translation.it: Si era detto che fossero fuggiti in Nuova Zelanda...

translation.en: Well, at least she didn't go unnoticed.
translation.it: Almeno la sua morte non è passata inosservata.

translation.en: ...police finally narrowed in on Waters and his partner in crime, Gary Karr...
translation.it: ...la polizia ha accusato Waters e il compare Gary Karr...

translation.en: She would've appreciated that.
translation.it: Ne sarebbe stata contenta.

translation.en: ...also charged with the murder of a third kidnapper.
translation.it: ...di aver ucciso un terzo rapitore.

translation.en: Please, no prayers. She wouldn't have wanted that.
translation.it: Lasciate stare le preghiere. Non le avrebbe volute.

translation.en: Does it worry you that, uh, when you die, that there's not going to be nirvana
translation.it: La preoccupa che dopo la sua morte non ci sarà alcun nirvana

translation.en: or whatever you care to call it?
translation.it: o come vuole chiamarlo lei?

translation.en: [laughs] When I die, I don't want some religious nut
translation.it: Quando morirò, non voglio che un fanatico religioso

translation.en: shoving a rosary up my ass or communion wafer down my throat.
translation.it: mi metta un rosario nel culo o mi ficchi un'ostia in gola.

translation.en: But I wouldn't mind a small corner of the outdoors
translation.it: Ma non mi dispiacerebbe un angolino all'aperto,

translation.en: where the sun can filter through the trees and lay a gentle hand on my face.
translation.it: dove il sole passi attraverso gli alberi e mi accarezzi in volto.

translation.en: Three words on my tombstone.
translation.it: Tre parole sulla mia lapide.

translation.en: "Woman." I've loved being a woman.
translation.it: "Donna." Mi piace essere donna.

translation.en: "Grandmother." I've loved being a grandmother.
translation.it: "Nonna." Mi piace essere nonna.

translation.en: And "mother." I have loved being a mother.
translation.it: E "madre". Mi piace essere madre.

translation.en: That's what I'd like to be remembered for most.
translation.it: Ecco per cosa vorrei soprattutto essere ricordata.

translation.en: That's what I'd like it to say on my tombstone, but...
translation.it: Vorrei che ci fosse scritto questo sulla mia lapide, ma...

translation.en: being who I am, I'm not expecting I'll be having a goddamn tombstone. [chuckles]
translation.it: ...visto quella che sono, non credo che avrò mai una cazzo di lapide.
